Text: WelcomeWelcome to Mail To transfer mail from your desktop EMail application to your handheld computer you must configure the HotSync feature on your desktop as follows Install Desktop software from the provided CD During install click Yes when youre asked if you want to set up the handheld Mail application Follow the steps in the Mail Setup Wizard to set up Mail settings You can return to the Mail Setup Wizard anytime On the Windows or NT desktop click the Start button Highlight Programs the Desktop program group and then Mail Setup When you press the HotSync button to synchronize your computer and your handheld email from your desktop EMail inbox appears in the handheld Mail application You can then read reply to forward delete and create new email on your handheld The next time you synchronize your actions are reflected both in your handheld and on your desktop EMail application Enjoy using Mail
